title: FIA hands more powers to Ben Sulayem, including veto over presidential challengers
summary: New statutes for the FIA have been approved, giving current president Mohammed Ben Sulayem the power to bar candidates from running against him

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current president of the FIA as of 2023?
What new power has been granted to the FIA president under the new statutes?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The power to veto presidential challengers
wrong_options: The power to change race regulations
The power to appoint race stewards
The power to approve team entries

qa_pairs.question: Which organization governs the rules and regulations of Formula 1?
